Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

Class PathUtils

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.PathUtils
public class PathUtils extends Object
This utility class contains methods for manipulating and converting between HAPI V2 Terser and FhirPath paths (as applied over V2 models).

    • getTerserPath

      public static String getTerserPath(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Structure s) throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Given a structure, get a Terser path for it
      Parameters:
      s - The structure to get a Terser path for
      Returns:
      The terser path to the specified structure within a message.
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception - If a path to the structure cannot be found in its message.
